column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020
column14: It is my first time to get recorder for my car and took while to install it but it comes out whith good result!  Even I am not driving as much as usual cause the stay home order,  it makes me feel more safety, especially when I parking my car by the side of street. It is easy to use and has multiple functions like play music,  Gps something. and my favorite part is it has really nice alarm system to let you know the situation around so I can be more confident when I drive.
